urls.title: Air India
urls.description: Air India, the National Carrier of India, offers connections to over 70 international and 100 domestic destinations for your travel plan. Book now and avail extra baggage allowance, business class upgrades and flexible change and rebooking options.

data.text:
#FlyAI: We are hiring Sr Trainee Co-Pilots with current A320 endorsement.
